trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for components that provide design-time support in a designer host for Web server controls that are derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 提供基底類別提供設計階段支援，在設計工具主機中的 Web 伺服器控制項的元件會衍生自<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: In a designer host, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> abstract class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 在設計工具主機中，當使用者從來源切換到設計檢視中，描述控制項的標記原始碼衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>抽象類別會剖析，並在設計介面上建立控制項的設計階段版本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者切換回原始碼檢視中時，設計階段控制項就會保存標記原始程式碼，並編輯成 Web 網頁的標記。

trans-unit.source: The BaseDataListDesigner abstract class serves as a base class for components that provide design-time support for controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> in a designer host.
trans-unit.target: BaseDataListDesigner 抽象類別做為衍生自的控制項提供設計階段支援的元件的基底類別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>設計工具主應用程式中。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: The BaseDataListDesigner class properties provide the following functionality: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
trans-unit.target: BaseDataListDesigner 類別屬性提供下列功能︰<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A>屬性會傳回<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>物件，其通常包含物件，衍生自<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>類別設計工具，在繼承樹狀結構中的每個層級。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataKeyField%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> properties provide access to the corresponding properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataKeyField%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A>屬性可存取之相關聯控制項的對應屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataKeyField%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A> property provides access to the designer of the data source of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A>屬性提供設計工具相關聯控制項的資料來源的存取。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DesignerView%2A> property gets the default view of the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DesignerView%2A>屬性會取得資料來源的預設檢視。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DesignerView%2A>

trans-unit.source: The BaseDataListDesigner class methods provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: BaseDataListDesigner 類別方法會提供下列功能:-<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A>方法準備以檢視、 編輯和設計關聯的控制項設計工具。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.InvokePropertyBuilder%2A> method invokes a component editor for the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.InvokePropertyBuilder%2A>方法會叫用控制項的元件編輯器。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.InvokePropertyBuilder%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method is used to add, remove, or shadow design-time properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>方法用來新增、 移除，或是遮蔽關聯控制項的設計階段屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A> method generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A>方法會產生可以在設計階段用做為資料來源的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method gets the data source from the container of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>方法取得的資料來源從關聯控制項的容器。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> method gets the data source from the control container, resolved to a specific data member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>方法取得從控制項容器中，解析成特定資料成員的資料來源。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource%2A> method gets the data source of the template container.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource%2A>方法取得的資料來源的 [範本] 容器。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method is called when there is a change to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>至相關聯的控制項變更時，呼叫方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method is called when the associated control data source has changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>方法針對關聯的控制項的資料來源有變更時呼叫。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method is called when the schema of the associated control data source changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>關聯的控制項的資料來源的結構描述變更時，所呼叫方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> method is called when an automatic formatting scheme has been applied.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A>時已套用自動格式化配置呼叫方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnStylesChanged%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged%2A> methods can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when an associated control style has changed or when the designer template-editing verbs have changed, respectively.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnStylesChanged%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged%2A>可以覆寫方法實作相關聯的控制項樣式變更時，或當設計工具的樣板編輯動詞命令已變更，分別應產生的功能。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnStylesChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnPropertyBuilder%2A> method handles the property-builder event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnPropertyBuilder%2A>方法處理屬性產生器事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnPropertyBuilder%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 在內部建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>類別時，它會建立關聯的控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>類別或該控制項的設計介面上的複本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer action list collection for this designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得此設計工具的設計工具的行動清單集合。

trans-unit.source: The ActionLists property creates an empty <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object and adds the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> that is returned by the ActionLists base property to this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: ActionLists 屬性建立空<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>物件並將加入<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>ActionLists 基底屬性所傳回至此<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>物件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>

trans-unit.source: Then it adds it to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, and then returns this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 然後它會將它加入<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>物件，然後再傳回此<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>物件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref>與這個設計工具相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the data key field of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定針對關聯控制項的資料索引鍵欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: The DataKeyField property provides access from the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: DataKeyField 屬性從設計工具提供存取至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>相關聯控制項屬性</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> indicates the primary key of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>表示相關聯的控制項繫結的資料來源的主索引鍵。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField*> value of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField*>針對關聯控制項的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the data member field of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定針對關聯控制項的資料成員欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: The DataMember property provides access from the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: DataMember 屬性從設計工具提供存取至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>相關聯控制項屬性</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> indicates the table or element of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>指出資料表或相關聯的控制項繫結資料來源的項目。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember*> value of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember*>針對關聯控制項的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the data source property of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定針對關聯控制項的資料來源屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The DataSource property provides access from the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: DataSource 屬性從設計工具提供存取至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>相關聯控制項屬性</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> value of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*>針對關聯控制項的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer of the data source, when one is selected for data binding.
trans-unit.target: 選取的資料繫結時，取得活動設計工具的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The DataSourceDesigner property returns the designer for the data source of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: DataSourceDesigner 屬性會傳回衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>相關聯控制項的資料來源的設計工具

trans-unit.source: The designer object implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具的物件會實作<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner>介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The designer for the data source of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 針對關聯控制項的資料來源設計工具。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the designer's version of the data source ID property and is used to shadow the corresponding property of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料來源的 ID 屬性的設計工具的版本，並用於遮蔽關聯控制項的對應屬性。

trans-unit.source: Setting the designer's DataSourceID property causes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the associated control to be set.
trans-unit.target: 設定設計工具的 DataSourceID 屬性原因<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>設定相關聯的控制項屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the DataSourceID is set to a <xref:System.String>, indicating a new data source is to be defined, a **Create Data Source** dialog box is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果設為 DataSourceID <xref:System.String>，指出新的資料來源定義，**建立資料來源**對話方塊隨即出現。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If the DataSourceID is set to a <xref:System.String> indicating there is no data source, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> is set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 如果設為 DataSourceID<xref:System.String>指出沒有資料來源，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>設為空字串 ("")。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that is the data source ID of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，是針對關聯控制項的資料來源 ID。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料來源繫結至相關聯控制項的預設檢視。

trans-unit.source: The DesignerView property gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control by passing the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: DesignerView 屬性取得資料來源是藉由傳遞繫結至相關聯控制項的預設檢視<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no view is returned or the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> property is not set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> is used to get the view names and the first view name is used to get the default view.
trans-unit.target: 如果不傳回的任何檢視或<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>未設定屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>用來取得檢視名稱 」 和 「 第一個檢視表名稱用來取得預設檢視。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"></xref> representing the default view of the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"> </xref>代表資料來源的預設檢視。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the designer and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋出設計工具所使用的 unmanaged 的資源，並選擇性釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: If the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class has a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> property that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> interface, the Dispose method disconnects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.LoadComplete> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果相關聯控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>類別具有<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A>屬性實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>中斷連線的介面，Dispose 方法<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.LoadComplete>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.LoadComplete> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> method, the Dispose disconnects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> events.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A>實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>中斷連線的方法，Dispose <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>，和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved>的事件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose also disconnects the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> events of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 也中斷<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged>

trans-unit.source: It finally calls the Dispose base method.
trans-unit.target: 最後，它會呼叫 Dispose 的基底方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: 會產生可以在設計階段用做為資料來源的物件。

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeDataSource method attempts to construct a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object from the data source that is defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: GetDesignTimeDataSource 方法嘗試建構<xref:System.Data.DataTable>從資料來源所定義的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: If this is not possible, it creates a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> from dummy data.
trans-unit.target: 如果不可行，它會建立<xref:System.Data.DataTable>從空的資料。</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of rows of sample data that the data source should contain.
trans-unit.target: 最小的資料來源應該包含的範例資料列數。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the returned data source contains dummy data; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the returned data source contains data from an actual data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果傳回的資料來源包含空的資料。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果傳回的資料來源包含實際資料來源的資料。

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface that serves as a data source for use at design time.
trans-unit.target: 實作<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>做為設計階段使用的資料來源的介面。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: 會產生可以在設計階段用做為資料來源的物件。

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeDataSource method attempts to construct a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object from the data source that is specified by the `selectedDataSource` parameter.
trans-unit.target: GetDesignTimeDataSource 方法嘗試建構<xref:System.Data.DataTable>從資料來源所指定的物件`selectedDataSource`參數。</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: If this is not possible, it creates a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> from dummy data.
trans-unit.target: 如果不可行，它會建立<xref:System.Data.DataTable>從空的資料。</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> that is used as a template for the data format.
trans-unit.target: 實作<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>用於做為範本的資料格式。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of rows of sample data that the data source data should contain.
trans-unit.target: 應包含的範例資料的資料來源的資料列的最小數目。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the returned data source contains dummy data; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the returned data source contains data from an actual data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果傳回的資料來源包含空的資料。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果傳回的資料來源包含實際資料來源的資料。

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface that serves as a data source for use at design time.
trans-unit.target: 實作<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>做為設計階段使用的資料來源的介面。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source component from the associated control container, resolved to a specific data member.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料來源元件從關聯的控制項的容器，解析成特定資料成員。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method to construct a data source from the object that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> properties of the associated control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>方法會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>方法來建構資料來源的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>相關聯的控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>屬性</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>所指定的物件從</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> of the associated control, resolved to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember*> parameter; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if a data source is not found.
trans-unit.target: 實作<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>包含設計階段介面<> *> 相關聯的控制項，解析為<> *> 參數，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果找不到資料來源。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source component from the associated control container.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料來源元件從關聯的控制項的容器。

trans-unit.source: The GetSelectedDataSource method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to construct a data source from the object that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> property of the associated control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: GetSelectedDataSource 方法會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法來建構資料來源從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>相關聯控制項的屬性</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>所指定的物件</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> property of the associated control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if a data source is not found.
trans-unit.target: 實作<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>包含設計階段介面<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*>針對關聯控制項的屬性，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果找不到資料來源。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source of the template's container.
trans-unit.target: 取得範本的容器的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The GetTemplateContainerDataSource method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> method to construct a data source from the object that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> properties of the associated control derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: GetTemplateContainerDataSource 方法呼叫的<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>方法來建構資料來源的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>相關聯的控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>屬性</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>所指定的物件從</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the name of the template for which to get the data source.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，指定要取得資料來源範本的名稱。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: An object that implements an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing a design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> property.
trans-unit.target: 物件，用於實作<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>包含設計階段介面<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 準備設計工具，來檢視、 編輯和設計關聯的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The designer host calls the Initialize method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具主應用程式準備好使用設計工具來呈現控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>時所呼叫 Initialize 方法

trans-unit.source: The Initialize method and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Initialize 方法和其基底方法設定屬性，並連接到所需的設計工具的作業事件。

trans-unit.source: The Initialize connects to the design-time data source and updates the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: 初始化連接設計階段資料來源，並更新的設計階段標記。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> property implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> interface, the Initialize connects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> events.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A>屬性實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>介面，初始化連線<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>，和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved>事件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the control, derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>, that is associated with this designer, or a copy of that control.
trans-unit.target: `component`參數是衍生自控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>，也就是與這個設計工具或該控制項的複本相關聯。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: A control derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"></xref>, which implements an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 衍生控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"> </xref>，它會實作<xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Invokes a component editor for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 叫用元件編輯器相關聯的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The InvokePropertyBuilder method creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor> or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> object, and then invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method of the component editor.
trans-unit.target: InvokePropertyBuilder 方法會建立<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor>或<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor>物件，然後再叫用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A>元件編輯器的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor>

trans-unit.source: The index of the page with which to initialize the component editor.
trans-unit.target: 用來初始化元件編輯器頁面的索引。

trans-unit.source: Handles the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AutoFormat" name="AutoFormat" href=""></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref uid="langword_csharp_AutoFormat" name="AutoFormat" href=""></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The OnAutoFormat method is obsolete and has no functionality.
trans-unit.target: OnAutoFormat 方法已過時，而且沒有任何功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>引發事件。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>物件，其中包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Called when an automatic formatting scheme has been applied to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 自動格式化配置已套用至相關聯的控制項時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The OnAutoFormatApplied method is called when a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> object is applied to the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>物件套用到衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>相關聯的控制項</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>時，會呼叫 OnAutoFormatApplied 方法

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> object defines a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle> object that is applied to the control.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>物件會定義<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle>套用至控制項的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>

trans-unit.source: A designer can override the OnAutoFormatApplied to inspect properties of the control or to take some other action.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具可以覆寫 OnAutoFormatApplied 檢查控制項的屬性，或採取其他動作。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat"></xref> object that defines a style.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat"> </xref>物件，定義樣式。

trans-unit.source: Called when there is a change to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 當關聯控制項的變更時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The OnComponentChanged method is called when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event of a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class executes.
trans-unit.target: OnComponentChanged 方法時，會呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>衍生自控制項的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>類別執行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is in response to a property change on the control (for example, a **Properties** grid change).
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，這是在回應上控制項的屬性變更 (例如，**屬性**方格變更)。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> object to which the control is bound is changed, the control is redrawn on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>變更此控制項繫結的物件，在設計介面上重繪控制項時。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>也就是事件來源。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 當關聯控制項的資料來源已變更時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceChanged base method connects the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class to the current data source, and if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, the method updates the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: OnDataSourceChanged 基底方法連接相關聯的控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>類別目前的資料來源，方法是從資料來源控制項已連線到不同，如果更新的設計階段標記。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the property-builder event.
trans-unit.target: 代表處理屬性產生器事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The OnPropertyBuilder method invokes a component editor for the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: OnPropertyBuilder 方法叫用元件編輯器相關聯控制項衍生的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: It creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor> or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> object, and then invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method of the component editor.
trans-unit.target: 它會建立<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor>或<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor>物件，然後再叫用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A>元件編輯器的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>也就是事件來源。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>物件，其中包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Called when the schema of the data source for the associated control changes.
trans-unit.target: 針對關聯控制項的資料來源的結構描述變更時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Unless the designer is in template-editing mode or a field is being added or edited, the OnSchemaRefreshed method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> method, which in turn calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method to update the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> control to reflect the data source change.
trans-unit.target: 除非在設計工具處於樣板編輯模式，或正在加入的欄位，或編輯，OnSchemaRefreshed 方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A>方法中，依序呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>方法，以更新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>以反映資料來源變更的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A>

trans-unit.source: Can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when a style of the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 會覆寫以實作針對關聯控制項的樣式變更時，應該進行的功能。

trans-unit.source: The OnStylesChanged method can serve as notification that a style of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class has changed.
trans-unit.target: OnStylesChanged 方法可以做為通知控制相關聯的樣式，衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>類別已變更。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: Can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when the designer template-editing verbs have changed.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫實作應該在設計工具的樣板編輯動詞命令已變更的功能。

trans-unit.source: The OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged method can be implemented to perform additional processing, such recording that a change has occurred, when the template-editing verbs change.
trans-unit.target: OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged 方法可以實作來執行額外處理，這類記錄已經發生變更，當範本編輯動詞命令變更。

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 在設計工具用來移除屬性或加入其他屬性的顯示中**屬性**方格，或是遮蔽關聯控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: 控制項設計工具使用的方法，以衍生自<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法来遮蔽各種控制項屬性與對應的設計階段屬性在設計工具實作，並將屬性加入到或從其中移除屬性**屬性**方格。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class, the PreFilterProperties creates design-time properties to shadow the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>類別 PreFilterProperties 建立設計階段屬性，以陰影<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: A collection implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> interface of the added and shadowed properties.
trans-unit.target: 集合，實作<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>的加入和已遮蔽屬性的介面。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.CanRefreshSchema*>.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.CanRefreshSchema*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.CanRefreshSchema*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider>介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the schema can be refreshed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果要重新整理結構描述。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.RefreshSchema*>.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.RefreshSchema*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.RefreshSchema*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider>介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to disable data-binding events until after the schema has been refreshed; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to enable the events.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要停用資料繫結事件結構描述之後，才重新整理。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>啟用事件。

trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.Schema*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.Schema*>

trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider>介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>
